channel.title: Cases got me stumped
channel.description: im nearing the end of my intelligent-less questions but cases got me confused, i know how to add them but, there was a case 10 an my ladder ID = 10.. [code]case 10: //Jad Mini Game Ladder teleportToX = 2421; teleportToY = 4684; break; [/code] = did nothing :/ what do i do if the case is already taken? i have alot of cases to add today, help is appreciated

item.title: Cases got me stumped
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

OK i added a succesfull ladder
could you show me what to add in a normal case for thieving and the reward is a random peice from a set of items
oh and, i also need to add, a limit like

case 1111: sendMessage("You must kill all 50 lessers to advance") else if(killcount = 50) teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = yyyy break;any way?

Read full topic

item.title: Cases got me stumped
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

you can use a low case i used cased # 2 lol…

case 2: //
teleportToX = 3069;
teleportToY = 3560;
sendMessage(“You teleport to the rune rocks!”);
break;

Read full topic

item.title: Cases got me stumped
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

I’m not sure, and you other guys correct me if I’m wrong, but I don’t think you can do cases that low. I’ve had problems like that myself. I believe they have to be above 100 in order to work.

[quote=“BurnInSilence, post:3, topic:133507”]yes how do i work around that? i mean wtf is duplicating a lable case

  • on top of that i cant get a case to work[/quote]

Duplicate Case means you already have defined that case. Try using another ladder.

Read full topic

@delta wrote:

if the case is already taken, an error in your compiler would say…duplicate lable case 10

item.title: Cases got me stumped

item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

im nearing the end of my intelligent-less questions
but cases got me confused, i know how to add them but,
there was a case 10 an my ladder ID = 10…

case 10: //Jad Mini Game Ladder teleportToX = 2421; teleportToY = 4684; break;
= did nothing
what do i do if the case is already taken?
i have alot of cases to add today, help is appreciated
